GameConditionDef.label: ash storm
GameConditionDef.description: Intense winds carrying a dense wall of ash, caused by nearby volcanic activity. Ash slowly asphyxiates anything caught outside unprepared, and damages plants ill-adapted for the region.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: an intense ash storm will converge on the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], killing outdoor plant and animal life
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The winds begin to calm. The ash storm has ended.
